Class FlyBoardEasy

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.FlyBoard
org.mio.progettoingsoft.model.FlyBoardEasy
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlyBoardServer
public class FlyBoardEasy extends FlyBoard
Concrete implementation of FlyBoard for the EASY game mode.

  • Constructor Details

    • FlyBoardEasy

      public FlyBoardEasy(Set<String> nicknames)
      Constructs a new FlyBoardEasy instance for the EASY game mode. Initializes the game board with the specified player nicknames.
      Parameters:
      nicknames - A Set of player nicknames participating in the game.

  • Method Details

      Specified by:

    • loadSldAdvCard

      protected Map<Integer,SldAdvCard> loadSldAdvCard()
      Loads adventure cards specifically for the Easy game mode. In Easy mode, only adventure cards with level = 1 are loaded from the "advCards.json" resource file.
      Specified by:
      loadSldAdvCard in class FlyBoard
      Returns:
      A Map where keys are the adventure card IDs and values are the loaded SldAdvCard objects.

    • drawCircuit

      public void drawCircuit()
      Delegates the drawing of the game circuit (player turn order) to the VisualFlyboardEasy class, which handles the text-based UI representation.
      Overrides:
      drawCircuit in class FlyBoard

    • drawScoreboard

      public void drawScoreboard()
      Delegates the drawing of the scoreboard to the VisualFlyboardEasy class, which handles the text-based UI representation.
      Overrides:
      drawScoreboard in class FlyBoard

    • createCircuite

      protected List<Optional<Player>> createCircuite()
      Creates and initializes the game circuit (player turn order) for Easy mode. In Easy mode, the circuit typically consists of 18 empty slots, indicating the progression of rounds or phases without pre-defined player positions.
      Specified by:
      createCircuite in class FlyBoard
      Returns:
      A List of Optional<Player> representing the initial circuit.

    • buildLittleDecks

      protected void buildLittleDecks()
      This method is a placeholder for building "little decks," a concept typically used in Normal/Hard game modes for distributing components. In Easy mode, components might be handled differently (e.g., open supply).
      Specified by:
      buildLittleDecks in class FlyBoard

    • getLittleDecks

      public List<List<Integer>> getLittleDecks()
      Throws an IncorrectFlyBoardException because "little decks" are not a feature of the Easy game mode. This prevents accidental calls or misinterpretations.
      Specified by:
      getLittleDecks in class FlyBoard
      Returns:
      (Never returns)
      Throws:
      IncorrectFlyBoardException - Always thrown as this feature is not supported.

    • getHiddenDeck

      public List<Integer> getHiddenDeck()
      Throws an IncorrectFlyBoardException because "little decks" are not a feature of the Easy game mode, and therefore cannot be set.
      Specified by:
      getHiddenDeck in class FlyBoard
      Parameters:
      decks - The list of decks to set (unused).
      Throws:
      IncorrectFlyBoardException - Always thrown as this feature is not supported.
